The Gankutsuou anime based on the novel The Count of Monte cRisto by Alexandre Dumas was one of the best anime ever, the ending should be like in the novel, but it was a great anime. I loved Edmond Dantes taking revenge on those who betrayed him and insensitive to his former bride. I wished that guy was like Edmond Dantes and get revenge on the girl as Edmond took revenge on his enemies. The guy passing the girlfriend's video over to the school and putting it on the internet to destroy her reputation. 
Edmond exposed the truth about Morcef and Villefort and destroy their reputation.

Continued> The boyfriend also worries about the sex becoming dull, but he clearly enjoys it still and says he enjoys it. So what is he worried about? Why does he want her to do the NTR play? Because he is worried that her life is becoming too big and exciting for him and that she will leave him if she feels constrained by a relationship where she can't do what she wants, either sexually or professionally. And so he wants to see if he can handle letting her fuck other men on HIS terms. This way he can allow her to do the things she wants while also not losing a relationship that is very important to him.

Everyone arguing about whether she will actually be stolen or whether she actually enjoyed it is missing the point. No, she will not be stolen per se. Yes she obviously liked it a lot. But everyone saying that he is an idiot or that he is definitely going to lose his girlfriend now are totally missing the main characters motivation. He doesn't want to do NTR play because he is a pervert, although obviously it turns him on a bit. The real reason he asks her to try the NTR play is because he realizes that his girlfriend is very special and that he can't be too jealous of her or he is going to lose her, not to another man, but to her ambitions of being an actress. On page 5 we see the boyfriend holding a script with a topless woman on it. It is obviously a script because it's the same width as the one his girlfriend is reading from. It is his girlfriend's script. She is obviously going to be acting in a play with a topless scene. This makes the boyfriend uncomfortable.  Continued>

So idk who said this was a rewrite, but you’re wrong. I read the original Japanese ending (what I could of it at least) and it’s pretty much the same thing. The ending is still 50/50 for since she just seems like a slut (regardless of their situation) but at the same time I can sort of believe that she still only “love” him, but at the same time its very clear she wants to do it again, and not just for MCs sake. 

Sidenote: This isn’t NTR, NTR is still cuckolding, this is cheating with some of that weird voyeuristic/open relationship shit thrown it, she isn’t “stolen” (yet). I imagine in a sequel she would “break” and be stolen, but as of right now it’s not technically NTR, at least by the common definition of it.
